name: tm71
effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user stabs the foe with a
sharpened stone from below. It has
a high critical-hit ratio.

Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for
five turns.
